descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...black background with colored shape
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...should stay the same
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...copy input grid over. find the bottom of the shape. Go up to the next row with the multicolored blocks and move everything over one row. Everything except the bottom row and the block that connect to the bottom row on the right side will have shifted one block over to the left.

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...copy the size pattern
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...follow the insturction

descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size... change the numbers

descriptions.description_input: In the input, you should see...two colored shapes
descriptions.description_output_grid_size: The output grid size...is the same as the input grid size
descriptions.description_output: To make the output, you have to...Slide each shape over one row and remove a center row from each shape to make narrow
